title: 820-2936 no sound
message:
This board have no sound. No speakers and no jack.
Where to start?

title: 820-2936 no sound
message: Hardware recognized in OSX? Checked voltages at the codec chip?

title: 820-2936 no sound
message: What you mean Hardware recognized in OSX? Volume icone is inactive and I cannot change the volume. Is that hardwar NOT recognized?

title: 820-2936 no sound
message: Does the machine chime at startup?

title: 820-2936 no sound
message: Hardware is in "about this mac" and see if audio device is listed.
